name: Panel Hack
description:
(Project is still in development)

Panel Hack is a puzzle game based on the Super Famicom game "Panel de Pon" (Localized as Tetris Attack or Puzzle League).  Slide tiles horizontally to create matches and combos, and to build up your HACK meter. When the meter is full you can unleash a Panel Hack! This will randomize all the tiles on the currently selected row, potentially leading to more opportunities to gain points. Alternatively, you can wait for the meter to fill up a second time to unleash a more powerful version, which will randomize the row below as well.

Controls:

Arrow keys / D-Pad - Move cursor

Z /  Bottom face button - Swap panels

X / Right face button - Panel Hack (when meter is full)

F / L1/R1 - Move board upward

ESC / Start / + / Options - Pause game

As the game is still in development, many planned features have yet to be implemented. Such features include:

  • Rebindable Controls
  • Local & Online Versus Modes
  • A Singleplayer Campaign
  • Alternative Hack Types
  • Alternative Background & Palette Options

Once the game has enough content to warrant it, you will need to pay for the full version. I'll likely keep a version as small as this one free as a demo though.
